summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1256, for the improvement of 31st Avenue North, from East John Street to East Republican Street, and other connecting streets and avenues, by laying of water mains, under Ordinance No. 13769 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
